#summary Videos rendered with boxplorer2

= Sample videos rendered with boxplorer2 =

 * [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GN6TIGY4PHI]
 Change width and height to desired dimensions in cfgs/menger-sphere.cfg and run
 `./boxplorer cfgs/menger-sphere.cfg --render --fixedfov --overunder`
 to regenerate that footage.

 * [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BKKReHQ6bvo]
 `./boxplorer cfgs/colonoscopy.cfg --render --fixedfov ---overunder`
 to regenerate the stereoscopic footage as uploaded to youtube.

 * [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MZRZ7KNsx9U]
 `./boxplorer cfgs/knighty/SpendFuelRods.cfg --render -fixedfov -overunder --time` to regenerate.

 * [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=I0ilmEcsj8c]
 `./boxplorer cfgs/knighty/Reflectoids.cfg --render --fixedfov --overunder` to regenerate.
